articles.title: Mattias Skjelmose carried from bike as only 44 riders finish wet, cold Flèche Wallonne - GCN - Global Cycling Network
articles.description: Skjelmose, Tom Pidcock and Michał Kwiatkowski among those who abandoned to seek refuge in the team bus as wind, sleet and snow batter the peloton in Belgium
articles.content: The men's Flèche Wallonne on Wednesday afternoon was battered by a deadly combination of crosswinds, rainfall and even snow at points, as Israel-Premier Tech's Stevie Williams won the most attritiona… [+6105 chars]

articles.author: Glenn Freeman
articles.title: F1's flawed sprint change proves critics right - The Race
articles.description: Formula 1’s first sprint event of 2024 takes place at the Chinese Grand Prix this weekend, with yet another adjustment to the format. But crucially, the tweaks made for 2024 suggest the dissenters against sprint races are right
articles.content: Formula 1s first sprint event of 2024 takes place at the Chinese Grand Prix this weekend, with yet another adjustment to the format. But crucially, the tweaks made for 2024 suggest the dissenters aga… [+4837 chars]
